translation.en: Are you a dangerous man?
translation.ja: あなたは危険人物ですか？

translation.en: The question first is whether I committed murder.
translation.ja: 僕が殺人犯かどうか次第だ

translation.en: And did you?
translation.ja: どうなんです？

translation.en: The courts, they have decided... no.
translation.ja: 判事たちの答えは― ノーだ

translation.en: I have faced trials.
translation.ja: 僕は裁判を受け

translation.en: I have faced allegations.
translation.ja: 疑惑に立ち向かい

translation.en: And the courts, they have decided.
translation.ja: 判決が出た

translation.en: That doesn't answer my question, does it?
translation.ja: 質問に答えてません

translation.en: That's my answer.
translation.ja: 僕の答えだ

translation.en: There are those who would say you got away with it.
translation.ja: こう言ってる人たちも いますよ うまく逃げたと

translation.en: That's what Time magazine said.
translation.ja: タイム誌だね

translation.en: Perhaps it's true.
translation.ja: そうかもしれない

translation.en: After all, I cannot now face trial...
translation.ja: でも もう裁判を 受けることはない

translation.en: anywhere in the world.
translation.ja: どの国でも

translation.en: - Time to party, girls. -
translation.ja: パーティタイムだ

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait.

translation.en: Alain!

translation.en: This is Alain, who I was telling you about.

translation.en: - Get them a drink, Ajay. - With pleasure.

translation.en: Looks like it's a fun night.

translation.en: The usual, my angel.
translation.ja: 〈いつもどおりだ〉

translation.en: Relax, we must take the fever down.
translation.ja: まずは熱を下げないと

translation.en: I want to go home.
translation.ja: 帰りたい

translation.en: Can you bring me his bag?
translation.ja: 〈彼のバッグは？〉

translation.en: Our home is Bangkok,
translation.ja: 本拠地はバンコクですが

translation.en: but next summer we'll open offices in Paris and Zurich.
translation.ja: パリとチューリッヒに 事務所を出します

translation.en: We have a network of couriers throughout Asia and Western Europe.
translation.ja: アジアと西ヨーロッパに 輸送ネットワークを 持っています

translation.en: Which is how we are able to offer such attractive prices.
translation.ja: だからこそ こんな魅力的な 価格を提示できるのです

translation.en: - Sorry. - Oh, it's all right.
translation.ja: 失礼 いいえ

translation.en: Who are you buying for?

translation.en: Oh, I'm not really buying.

translation.en: - You're Dutch? - Yes.
translation.ja: オランダ人？ そう

translation.en: But not entirely kwailo, are you?

translation.en: You're like me.
translation.ja: 僕もなんだ 父がインドネシア人だ

translation.en: Mine is Indian,

translation.en: and my mama is from Vietnam.

translation.en: It can be confusing sometimes.

translation.en: - I'm Alain. - Willem.

translation.en: - Wim. - My wife, Monique.

translation.en: - Wim. - Don't you want to know the cost?

translation.en: Okay, yeah.

translation.en: That one.
translation.ja: あれ

translation.en: Then you are buying for someone.
translation.ja: これを プレゼントでしょ？

translation.en: - Yeah. - What is her name?
translation.ja: ああ 何て名前？

translation.en: - Lena. - Lena?
translation.ja: レーナ レーナ？

translation.en: - Wow, is he a professional? - He is.

translation.en: You're in very good hands.
translation.ja: 彼に任せれば安心よ

translation.en: - How much? -

translation.en: If you'd like, I'm certain I can break him down to... this?

translation.en: Thank you. Sorry, I...

translation.en: I should go. Sorry.
translation.ja: 帰るよ　ゴメン

translation.en: My friend?

translation.en: How long have you been gone from home?
translation.ja: 旅はどれくらい？

translation.en: - A year. - And you have not run out of money yet?
translation.ja: １年 よくお金が続いてるわね

translation.en: No, we've been... sensible.
translation.ja: それは 僕らが倹約家だから

translation.en: But still, you want to tell Lena that you love her.
translation.ja: それでも　レーナに 気持ちを伝えたいのね

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
translation.ja: ああ もちろん

translation.en: If I told you...
translation.ja: もし僕が―

translation.en: I could have you made a sapphire set in diamonds
translation.ja: ダイヤを添えたサファイアの プラチナリングを

translation.en: on a platinum ring for half the price I just showed you,
translation.ja: ダイヤを添えたサファイアの プラチナリングを 今の半額で作ってあげると 言ったらどうする？

translation.en: what would you say?
translation.ja: 今の半額で作ってあげると 言ったらどうする？

translation.en: We didn't come out here for jewelry.
translation.ja: 〈宝石を買いに ここに来たんじゃない〉 〈宝石を買いに ここに来たんじゃない〉 〝オランダ製 〞

translation.en: That money could keep us going to Kathmandu, even Kabul.
translation.ja: 〝オランダ製 〞 〝オランダ製 〞 〈そのお金で カトマンズか―〉 〈カブールまで行ける〉

translation.en: We've got to go home some time.
translation.ja: 〈でも そろそろ帰らないと〉

translation.en: - You want to go home? -
translation.ja: 〈家に帰りたいの？〉

translation.en: Just whatever's next for us.

translation.en: An apartment?
translation.ja: 〈アパートでも〉

translation.en: A houseboat maybe.
translation.ja: 〈アパートでも〉 〈ボートでも〉

translation.en: Like an old married couple, then?
translation.ja: 〈まるで老夫婦みたい〉

translation.en: - An old married couple? -
translation.ja: 〈老夫婦？〉

translation.en: - Hello, Wim. - Lena.

translation.en: Mon dieu! You're so pretty.
translation.ja: 〈驚いた〉 すごく かわいい

translation.en: There's no obligation.

translation.en: Try it on.
translation.ja: はめてごらん

translation.en: Wow.

translation.en: Still a lot of money.
translation.ja: でも高いわ

translation.en: We understand.

translation.en: You do not need to decide now. Do they?
translation.ja: 今すぐ決めなくてもいいのよ

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.ja: もちろんだ

translation.en: We're going to see you in Bangkok, yes?
translation.ja: バンコクでまた会えるしね

translation.en: Well, all right.
translation.ja: 行く？

translation.en: Are you sure it's okay for us to stay?
translation.ja: 泊めてもらえるの？

translation.en: - Yes, of course it is. - Our home is always open to friends.
translation.ja: もちろん 友達はいつでも大歓迎だ

translation.en: Let him buy you the ring, Lena.

translation.en: Is that okay?
translation.ja: 〈ほんとに？〉

translation.en: - Are you sure? No... - Yes... Of course.

translation.en: Let's dance!

translation.en: - Yes? - Mr. Knippenberg?

translation.en: Yes, Lawana?

translation.en: Uh, what time did the others leave?
translation.ja: 他の人たちはいつ頃出た？

translation.en: That long, huh?
translation.ja: とっくの昔？

translation.en: It's just this gentleman, Mr. Hilgers,
translation.ja: このヒルガースという人が 人を捜してほしいと

translation.en: is asking for help in locating his sister- in- law Helena Dekker
translation.ja: 義理の妹の ヘレナ･デッカーさんと

translation.en: and Willem Bloem, her boyfriend.
translation.ja: 彼女の恋人の ヴィレム･ブルーム氏だ

translation.en: To help us, he also enclosed an accompanying package
translation.ja: 休日に撮った 写真と家に届いた手紙も―

translation.en: of holiday photographs and letters home.
translation.ja: 送ると書いてある

translation.en: But that package has not arrived.
translation.ja: でも まだ届いてない

translation.en: How can we help find them if we've lost their damn photographs?

translation.en: Perhaps if you left it with me?
translation.ja: 私に任せたらいかがです？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: What do they say, Yotin?
translation.ja: 何て言ってるんだ？

translation.en: They talk about the Communists, sir.

translation.en: In Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia.

translation.en: They ask if Thailand might also fall to revolution.
translation.ja: 次はタイに革命が 起こりそうだと

translation.en: Well, it might improve the traffic.

translation.en: Jasmine, sir?

translation.en: No, thank you.
translation.ja: 〈結構だ〉

translation.en: Goddamnit.
translation.ja: 〈まいったな〉

translation.en: Yotin, it started at 4:00 and it's already quarter past.

translation.en: Surely it would be quicker to walk? This is Athidhaya Road.
translation.ja: 降りて歩くよ アティダヤ通りだろ

translation.en: The athletic club is only three or four blocks north.
translation.ja: アスレチッククラブは すぐそこだ

translation.en: - But Mr. Knippenberg-- - I can't just sit here.

translation.en: - Oh. S- Sorry. -

translation.en: - Herman! - Hi.

translation.en: Are you all right?

translation.en: Ambassador. I'm sorry, the traffic was unbelievable.

translation.en: We didn't move a yard in 30 minutes, and the rain...
translation.ja: 〈その後 雨が…〉 こちら三等書記官の クニッペンバーグです

translation.en: This is Knippenberg, my Third Secretary.

translation.en: I told Angela to play with De Jongh. As you were late.

translation.en: To add to the four or five other languages she already speaks.

translation.en: If she wasn't German, I'd offer her a job!
translation.ja: ドイツ人じゃないなら 雇いたかったのに

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, may I speak with you briefly on a consular matter?

translation.en: I thought the office was shut.
translation.ja: オフィスは閉まってる

translation.en: Yes, no, of course, but I thought this was rather urgent.

translation.en: Two young Dutch backpackers.
translation.ja: ２人のオランダ人の若者で

translation.en: Their families haven't heard from them in over two months.
translation.ja: 家族が２ヵ月 連絡が取れないのだそうです

translation.en: Knippenberg, when did you last speak to your mother?
translation.ja: 母親と 最後に話したのは？

translation.en: And does she write letters declaring you missing?
translation.ja: 彼女は 君の失踪届を出すか？

translation.en: It's not a diplomat's job to go chasing after longhair bums.
translation.ja: ヒッピーどもを 追いかけるのは 外交官の仕事ではない タイの警察の仕事だ

translation.en: If it's for anyone, it's for the Thai police.

translation.en: Pass it on to them if you're so concerned.
translation.ja: 心配なら奴らにやらせろ

translation.en: Yes, sir, of course, Ambassador.

translation.en: Oh, good shot.
translation.ja: うまい所に打った

translation.en: Once again, a Dutch triumph over you Brits.

translation.en: Yes, please!

translation.en: Hey, Herman.

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.ja: 〈おめでとう〉

translation.en: - Hello. - What was all that?

translation.ja: 行方不明者を捜そうとしたが

translation.en: Worried family. But it's a police matter, apparently.

translation.en: My mother warned me about this.
translation.ja: ママも心配してた

translation.en: He takes his work too seriously.
translation.ja: “彼はまじめに 仕事をしすぎる”

translation.en: He will never take the day off to make love to you

translation.en: on the 15th floor of the Siam Point.

translation.en: Well, it only has eight floors, so technically, she was correct.

translation.en: It's too much. Too generous.

translation.en: But Alain is expecting us.

translation.en: We can go and see them later.

translation.en: Wim!

translation.en: Lena?

translation.en: Well, there's the orange.
translation.ja: ここがオレンジだし

translation.en: But, really... that, of course.

translation.en: No. Alain wouldn't allow it. Not for his friends.

translation.en: That place gets worse by the week.
translation.ja: あの辺は今最悪だ

translation.en: The bathwater comes straight out of the klong.
translation.ja: 風呂には 運河の水を使ってるし

translation.en: People get robbed.
translation.ja: 治安も悪い

translation.en: - We don't want to go to the-- - No.

translation.en: Welcome to Bangkok. Come on, then.
translation.ja: バンコクにようこそ 行くぞ

translation.en: Look who I found.
translation.ja: 連れてきたよ

translation.en: - Hey. Welcome. - Lena!
translation.ja: やあ レーナ ようこそ

translation.en: You made it.
translation.ja: 待ってたのよ

translation.en: - Nice to see you. - You too. Welcome.
translation.ja: モニク よく来たわね

translation.en: - Welcome to Kanit House. - Thank you very much.
translation.ja: カニット･ハウスへようこそ

translation.en: - How was the trip? - Yeah, it was good.

translation.en: This is Frankie.
translation.ja: この子はフランキーよ

translation.en: - Our friend Dominique. - Bonjour.
translation.ja: 彼はドミニク 〈こんにちは〉

translation.en: - This is for you. For you. - Thank you.
translation.ja: どうぞ ありがと

translation.en: - Fresh towel. - Well, thank you very much.
translation.ja: 冷たいタオルも これはありがたい

translation.en: It's really good.
translation.ja: すごく気持ちいい

translation.en: Here, I'll take your bag for you.
translation.ja: 僕が返しとく

translation.en: Come on. We'll wash your dirty things for you.
translation.ja: 汚れ物があれば洗うよ

translation.en: - But it's all dirty. - Then we'll wash it all.

translation.en: Won't we, Dominique?
translation.ja: 全部洗ってくれ

translation.en: Yes, Alain.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Thanks for not listening to me.
translation.ja: 〈私の言うとおりにしなくて 正解ね〉

translation.en: Now, wash, rest. Make yourself at home.

translation.en: I'm calling from the Dutch Embassy
translation.ja: 〈オランダ大使館の―〉

translation.en: on behalf of Herman Knippenberg.
translation.ja: 〈クニッペンバーグの 代理の者です〉

translation.en: I'd like to talk to someone concerning a missing persons enquiry.
translation.ja: 〈行方不明の担当者を お願いします〉

translation.en: I am very sorry, Mr. Knippenberg,
translation.ja: クニッペンバーグさん 残念ですが

translation.en: but the police ask us to call back after the holiday.
translation.ja: 警察は祝日明けに かけ直すようにと

translation.en: - But that's three days. - Lawana!
translation.ja: だけど 休みは３日もある

translation.en: - Okay, Lawana, you can go. - Sir.
translation.ja: ご苦労様　帰っていいよ では

translation.en: Knippenberg, you've passed that business onto the police?
translation.ja: 〈あの件は警察に 引き継いだか？〉

translation.en: Yes, Ambassador.
translation.ja: 〈はい　大使〉

translation.en: Just this moment.
translation.ja: 〈今 連絡したところです〉

translation.en: Belgium.
translation.ja: 〈ベルギーです〉

translation.en: Oh, Mr. Siemons? It's Herman Knippenberg.
translation.ja: シーモンズさんですか？ クニッペンバーグです

translation.en: I sit on the Intergovernmental Narcotics Liaison with you.
translation.ja: 大使館の麻薬対策連絡会で お会いした者です

translation.en: - Which one are you? - Excuse me?
translation.ja: 所属は？ あの…

translation.en: - Nation! - Oh! Dutch.
translation.ja: 国は？ オランダです

translation.en: I believe the Belgian Embassy
translation.ja: きっと通常業務以外の 仕事を―

translation.en: also asks you to manage its more irregular problems.
translation.ja: きっと通常業務以外の 仕事を― 頼まれることがあると思って

translation.en: And what can I do for you, my clog- wearing friend?
translation.ja: オランダ君が 私に何の用なんだ？

translation.en: You know they're not technically your problem?
translation.ja: 君とは関係ない問題だよな 大使も警察に言えと

translation.en: Yes. The Ambassador says to phone the police,
translation.ja: 大使も警察に言えと

translation.en: but they're on holiday.
translation.ja: でも　休暇中で…

translation.en: Yeah, I'll bet they are.
translation.ja: そうだろうな

translation.en: Are you eating?
translation.ja: 〈注文は？〉 〈こんにちは〉

translation.en: Soup?
translation.ja: 〈スープ？〉

translation.en: No soup.
translation.ja: 〈いいえ 結構です〉

translation.en: They expect great things of you, I imagine.
translation.ja: 期待されてるんだろうね

translation.en: Pardon me?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: - You have a master's degree? - Yes.
translation.ja: 修士号を持ってるだろ？

translation.en: Advanced International Studies.
translation.ja: 専攻は国際関係論

translation.en: Taken at Johns Hopkins, Bologna and Washington.
translation.ja: イタリアとアメリカの 大学院に行きました

translation.en: - You did well? - Yes. A distinction.
translation.ja: 成績は？ トップクラスでした

translation.en: And now you want to fuck it all up?
translation.ja: なのに こんな仕事を？

translation.en: Good for you!
translation.ja: 偉いぞ

translation.en: - Now, you want to find them? - Well, yes.
translation.ja: 見つけたいのか？ はい

translation.en: Then pay attention.
translation.ja: よく聞けよ

translation.en: First, did they even get here?
translation.ja: まず ここに２人は来た？

translation.en: If they did, there will be documentation. Landing cards.
translation.ja: 来たなら 記録が残ってるはずだ 来たなら 記録が残ってるはずだ 〝ヴィレム･ブルーム ヘレナ･デッカー 〞 入国カードだ

translation.en: They definitely arrived, sir.
translation.ja: 確かに入国してます 確かに入国してます 〝デッカー･ヘレナ 〞

translation.en: Check the major Poste Restantes.
translation.ja: 次は局留め郵便を

translation.en: These young travelers rely on them for news from home.
translation.ja: 若い旅行者は必ず利用する

translation.en: So, check if they pick up any letters.
translation.ja: 手紙を取りに来たか調べろ

translation.en: I thought the Ambassador told you to pass it on to the police?
translation.ja: 大使は警察に 任せとけばいいって…

translation.en: It's just one phone call.
translation.ja: １本電話するだけだ

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.ja: どう思う？

translation.en: Well, I think it's disobedient.
translation.ja: 命令に背くことになるけど

translation.en: I don't speak the language, Angela.
translation.ja: 僕 タイ語ができないから

translation.en: Do you have any letters for Willem Bloem or Helena Dekker?
translation.ja: 〈ヴィレム･ブルームか〉 〈ヘレナ･デッカー宛の 手紙はありますか〉

translation.en: Six for Bloem from Amsterdam.
translation.ja: 〝ＷＳ ブルーム 〞 〈アムステルダムから ブルーム宛に６通来てます〉 〈アムステルダムから ブルーム宛に６通来てます〉

translation.en: Yes, there are letters.
translation.ja: 手紙はあった

translation.en: He never collected them?
translation.ja: 取りに来ては？

translation.en: Did you ever hear of this place?
translation.ja: このホテル知ってる？

translation.en: Santa Cruz Hotel.
translation.ja: サンタクルーズ･ホテル

translation.en: It's one of those traveler hostels.
translation.ja: バックパッカー用の ホステルよ

translation.en: It's where I go to buy your pot.
translation.ja: ハッパが買える

translation.en: - I don't smoke pot. -
translation.ja: ハッパは吸わない

translation.en: Come.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: - Hello. - Who are you, man?
translation.ja: どうも 何の用？

translation.en: I wonder if you might help me. I work for the Dutch embassy.
translation.ja: オランダ大使館の者ですが

translation.en: I'm looking for two people.
translation.ja: 実は人を捜してます

translation.en: A Miss Helena Dekker
translation.ja: ヘレナ･デッカーさんと

translation.en: and a Mr. Willem Bloem.
translation.ja: ヴィレム･ブルームさん

translation.en: Here on their landing cards it says Santa Cruz Hotel.
translation.ja: 入国カードに滞在先は ここだと

translation.en: I wonder if you could look to see if they checked in?
translation.ja: チェックインしたか 調べてください

translation.en: It should be December 11th or 12th.
translation.ja: チェックインしたか 調べてください 12月11日辺りで

translation.en: They were never here, man.
translation.ja: 来てないね

translation.en: See for yourself.
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: Hey, Company Man! Are you done? Or do you need a xerox?
translation.ja: おい まだか？ コピー機が必要か？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: おい まだか？ コピー機が必要か？ ありがと

translation.en: So they arrived in Bangkok,
translation.ja: つまり バンコクには着いたが

translation.en: but never made it to the hotel.
translation.ja: ホテルに行かなかった

translation.en: Where did they go?
translation.ja: どこに消えた

translation.en: Perhaps they didn't stick to their schedule, Company Man.

translation.en: Sorry. I just got in.
translation.ja: ゴメンね 着いたばかりで

translation.en: - Bad jet lag. - No hassle, man.
translation.ja: 時差ボケで ゆっくりやって

translation.en: How long are you staying?
translation.ja: 何日いるの？

translation.en: Um... I'm heading to Nepal tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 ネパールに発つの

translation.en: Oh. That's cool.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Do you want to split a room maybe? Might be cheaper.
translation.ja: 部屋をシェアしない？ そのほうが安く済む

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.ja: そうね いいわ

translation.en: - All right. - Okay, cool.
translation.ja: オーケー じゃあ ふたり

translation.en: Two.
translation.ja: じゃあ ふたり

translation.en: - Hey, what's your name? - Teresa.
translation.ja: 名前は？ 名前は？ 〝テレサ･ノートン 〞 〝テレサ･ノートン 〞 〝テレサ･ノートン 〞 テレサ

translation.en: Teresa?
translation.ja: テレサ

translation.en: Oh, no. No, thanks.
translation.ja: いらない　吸わないの

translation.en: Hey, you're not a Jesus freak, are you?
translation.ja: 厳格なクリスチャン？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: Why Nepal if you don't smoke hash?
translation.ja: 大麻吸わないのに ネパールに？

translation.en: Kathmandu is still freak Nirvana.
translation.ja: カトマンズはいまでも ハッパ天国

translation.en: I'm not going to Kathmandu.
translation.ja: カトマンズには行かないの

translation.en: Sure you don't want to get high?
translation.ja: ハイにならない？

translation.en: Why get high, Celia?
translation.ja: なぜその必要があるの？

translation.en: I mean, isn't all this a little bit of a trip already?
translation.ja: こうしてるだけで 最高の気分になれない？

translation.en: This is...
translation.ja: これ…

translation.en: Maybe you should keep it.
translation.ja: よかったらあげる

translation.en: - Do you want it? - Yes, I do.
translation.ja: 欲しい？ もらってもいい？

translation.en: Seriously, maybe you're, like, my spirit guide or something.
translation.ja: あなたは 私の魂のガイドみたい

translation.en: - Your spirit guide? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 魂のガイド？

translation.en: Well, your spirit guide needs a fucking drink.
translation.ja: 魂のガイドは飲みたくなった

translation.en: So you drink, then?
translation.ja: お酒は飲むの？

translation.en: Follow your spirit guide.
translation.ja: 魂の導きに従って

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.ja: こっちよ

translation.en: - I'm Ajay. - Celia.
translation.ja: アジェイだ セリアよ

translation.en: - Celia? Ah! What are you doing tonight? - Thanks.
translation.ja: セリア？　今晩の予定は？ ありがと

translation.en: - You two are friends? - Yeah.
translation.ja: ２人は友達？ ええ

translation.en: Hey, there's a party, you guys should both come.
translation.ja: パーティがあるんだ 一緒に来ない？

translation.en: - Don't know. - Really, it'll be a cool scene. Hip, you know? Not like the tourists here.
translation.ja: イカした連中が集まるんだぜ こことは大違い

translation.en: Save it for the next two girls you pick up.
translation.ja: 続きは次にナンパする子に

translation.en: The next two girls won't be you two though, will they?
translation.ja: それは君たちだ

translation.en: There's a pool. Bring your bikinis and we can have a swim.
translation.ja: ビキニを持ってくれば プールで泳げるぞ

translation.en: Or don't bring your bikinis, and we can have a swim.
translation.ja: 持ってこなくても泳げる

translation.en: Let's drop him. He's a creep.
translation.ja: やめとこう　気色悪い

translation.en: - Celia... - Yeah?
translation.ja: セリア 何？

translation.en: - Let me tell you where I'm headed. - Yeah?
translation.ja: 明日の行き先だけど

translation.en: I'm going to a Buddhist monastery.
translation.ja: 仏教の僧院に行くの

translation.en: I was there a year ago and I'm going back, but to live.
translation.ja: 去年 訪ねた僧院に行って そこに住むの

translation.en: What? Like a nun?
translation.ja: 尼さんみたい

translation.en: Not like. Actually a nun.
translation.ja: みたいじゃない 本物の尼になるの

translation.en: There's a whole bunch of things that I will never get to do again,
translation.ja: やれなくなることが いっぱいあるから

translation.en: and I want to do them now.
translation.ja: やっておきたいの

translation.en: What, with that guy?
translation.ja: あんな男と？

translation.en: - If you're sure. Okay. - Hey, you're amazing.
translation.ja: そうなら 行って 大好き

translation.en: So are you. So are you, hon.
translation.ja: 私もあなたが大好き

translation.en: - Erm, okay, cool, well, have fun. - I'll see you...
translation.ja: それじゃあ また… また いつか…

translation.en: - Yeah. - Maybe.
translation.ja: また いつか…

translation.en: Welcome back. What's your name?
translation.ja: おかえり　名前は？

translation.en: Oh, just some shit.
translation.ja: ああ… 誰かさん

translation.en: Some shit. Great.
translation.ja: 誰かさん？ オーケー

translation.en: I did everything you said, Paul. Wim Bloem and Lena Dekker
translation.ja: ４ヵ月後 言われたとおりに しました ４ヵ月後 ４ヵ月後 ヴィムとレーナは―

translation.en: landed in Bangkok but never checked in to their--
translation.ja: バンコクに着いたものの ホテルには現れな…

translation.en: Oi, Siemons! Who's your girlfriend?
translation.ja: シーモンズ　その彼女は？

translation.en: - Laver. Australia. - Laver, like the tennis player, right?
translation.ja: オーストラリアのレーバーだ テニスの選手と同じですね

translation.en: Nothing like, mate. More's the fucking pity.
translation.ja: 全然違う　哀れなもんさ

translation.en: - Nippenberg from the Dutch. - It's Knippenberg.
translation.ja: オランダ人のニッペンバーグ クニッペンバーグです

translation.en: How long you got left, Ker- nippenberg?
translation.ja: クニッペンバーグ 君は残りあと何年？

translation.en: - Left? - Before you go home?
translation.ja: 残り？ 帰国は？

translation.en: Quite some time. We only arrived six months ago.
translation.ja: まだずっと先ですね 僕らが来たのは半年前です

translation.en: - We? - My wife and I.
translation.ja: 僕ら？ 僕と妻

translation.en: Jesus. Good luck with that.
translation.ja: せいぜい頑張れよ

translation.en: Knippenberg has lost a couple of longhairs and it's troubling him.
translation.ja: 行方不明のヒッピーを 捜すのに 今苦戦してる

translation.en: Peace and love, right, Knippenberg?
translation.ja: ラブ･アンド･ピースの 旅だろ

translation.en: They're someone's children and they're missing.
translation.ja: 心配する家族がいます

translation.en: They're work- shy hobos, mate.
translation.ja: 働きもせずに ふらふらして

translation.en: I disagree. What they do is hard work.
translation.ja: いいえ 彼らの旅は過酷です

translation.en: There's no five- star hotels,
translation.ja: エアコンもない 安ホテルに泊まり

translation.en: no air- conditioning, no drivers.
translation.ja: エアコンもない 安ホテルに泊まり 運転手もなし

translation.en: Let's get them all a fucking medal, shall we?
translation.ja: 勲章でも授けろ

translation.en: Living in Squalor Medal.
translation.ja: 極貧生活勲章

translation.en: Gentlemen. My apologies.
translation.ja: 悪いが ちょっと

translation.en: If you'll excuse me for one moment?
translation.ja: 失礼するよ お連れ様は入れません

translation.en: Your friends are not welcome here.
translation.ja: お連れ様は入れません

translation.en: Let's move over here.
translation.ja: あっちに

translation.en: I'll tell you a story about longhairs.
translation.ja: １つ教えてやろう

translation.en: It's a good story, once you get to the end.
translation.ja: いい話だ 最後まで聞けばな

translation.en: I had a pair of murder victims
translation.ja: ２人の遺体が運ばれた

translation.en: on a Thai cop mortuary slab.
translation.ja: 警察の霊安室にな

translation.en: Aussie hippy kids, Knippenberg.
translation.ja: オーストラリア人の ヒッピーだ

translation.en: On their fucking hippy trip.
translation.ja: 彼らは旅行中に―

translation.en: They'd been killed, set on fire,
translation.ja: 殺されて 焼かれて

translation.en: their faces disfigured.
translation.ja: ぐしゃぐしゃの顔で

translation.en: They found them in a ditch 58 Ks south of the old city at Ayutthaya.
translation.ja: アユタヤから58キロ南の 排水溝で見つかった

translation.en: I thought you said this was a good story?
translation.ja: さっきはいい話だと？

translation.en: You got to wait to the end, don't you?
translation.ja: 最後まで聞けばだ

translation.en: You ever go to bed with two women at the same time?
translation.ja: ２人の女と同時に 寝たことある？

translation.en: The travelers, what happened to the travelers?
translation.ja: その旅行者に何が？

translation.en: - Forgive me, the Belgian attaché... -
translation.ja: うちの大使館員だが

translation.en: ...is a constant embarrassment.
translation.ja: 恥さらしだ

translation.en: Asshole.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: - Time to go, mate. - My advice?
translation.ja: もう時間だ いいか

translation.en: Don't waste your time with longhairs.
translation.ja: 奴らに時間を割くな

translation.en: - Night, gents. - Where's he going?
translation.ja: おやすみ どこに？

translation.en: He's worried about the curfew.
translation.ja: 外出禁止の時間だ

translation.en: Right. Aren't you?
translation.ja: そうだ　あなたは？

translation.en: I'm staying right here till morning.
translation.ja: 朝までここにいるつもりだ

translation.en: See it through with me, Cloggy.
translation.ja: オランダ君もどう？

translation.en: - Sorry, Paul. -
translation.ja: 僕はこれで

translation.en: Mr. Laver, your story about the two Australian travelers?
translation.ja: レーバーさん そのオーストラリア人の 旅行者は？

translation.en: Johnson and Rosanna Watson.
translation.ja: ジョンソンと ロザンナ･ワトソン

translation.en: - That was their names? - That's who the cops thought they were.
translation.ja: 二人の名前？ 警察はそう思ってた

translation.en: - - But they weren't?
translation.ja: でも違った

translation.en: Told you it was a good story.
translation.ja: いい話だと言ったろ？

translation.en: So your bodies, you still have no names for them?
translation.ja: 遺体は一体誰なんですか？

translation.en: No! Not mine. Not my bodies.
translation.ja: 俺にはもう関係ない

translation.en: Not any more, mate. That's someone else's problem.
translation.ja: 他の奴がやる仕事だよ

translation.en: - Whose? - Whose what?
translation.ja: 誰です？ 誰って？

translation.en: Whose problem are the two unidentified bodies?
translation.ja: その身元不明の遺体は 誰が？

translation.en: Whose bloody murder case is it?
translation.ja: 担当は誰ですか？

translation.en: Hey! Keep your hair on, you little fucking mouse with clogs on.
translation.ja: おい 落ち着けよ このオランダ野郎が

translation.en: It's the Western District Division.
translation.ja: 担当は西部地域課だ

translation.en: No, wait! Eastern.
translation.ja: いや 待てよ 東部だ

translation.en: - Eastern Division. You're sure? - Sure as eggs, mate.
translation.ja: 東部地域課ですね？ そうだ

translation.en: And the Australian couple, where are they now?
translation.ja: オーストラリア人の夫婦は？

translation.en: What I've been trying to tell you, mate.
translation.ja: 俺はそれを話したかったんだ

translation.en: They just showed up.
translation.ja: 生きてたんだよ

translation.en: They've been on some island living on coconuts and fish heads.
translation.ja: どっかの島でココナッツを 食べてた

translation.en: Stupid fucking hippies.
translation.ja: 人騒がせな奴らだ

translation.en: Let's go for this one.
translation.ja: それじゃあ これにしようか

translation.en: Excellent choice.
translation.ja: お目が高い

translation.en: Excuse me, Alain. Have you seen Lena?
translation.ja: いいかな　アラン レーナを見た？

translation.en: - Pool, I think. - All right, thank you.
translation.ja: プールだろ？ そうか　ありがと

translation.en: I brought you a beer.
translation.ja: ビール飲む？

translation.en: - Thank you. Cheers. - Cheers.
translation.ja: ありがと 乾杯

translation.en: So you are French?
translation.ja: フランス人なの？

translation.en: Québécoise. Canada. The French part.
translation.ja: 〈フレンチ･カナディアン〉 カナダのフランス語圏

translation.en: It's amazing, right? The friends you make when you're far away from home.
translation.ja: 遠い異国で友達を 作れるなんて

translation.en: - It's the best thing about it, I think. - Yes.
translation.ja: 最高だと思わない？ そうね

translation.en: So, can I ask how you guys ended up here together?
translation.ja: ２人はどうして ここに住むことに？

translation.en: I came for a holiday.
translation.ja: 私は休暇で来た

translation.en: But you didn't go home?
translation.ja: でも帰らなかった

translation.en: I did not.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: He made it impossible for me.
translation.ja: 彼と出会ってしまったから

translation.en: Hello, Wim.
translation.ja: ヴィム

translation.en: - Sleep well? - Yeah, like a child.
translation.ja: よく寝た？ ええ ぐっすり

translation.en: And you two?
translation.ja: そっちは？

translation.en: We were just friends.
translation.ja: 友達だったの

translation.en: You two are going to get married, yes?
translation.ja: 君たちは結婚するんだろ？

translation.en: Well, she's not marrying anyone else, that's for sure.
translation.ja: 彼女が結婚するのは 僕だけだ

translation.en: Well, you're adorable together.
translation.ja: お似合いのカップルよ

translation.en: - Not as romantic as you and Alain. - I want to help you.
translation.ja: あなたたちには負ける いい話がある

translation.en: Those two stones you just saw me sell?
translation.ja: さっき売ってた２つの石…

translation.en: Two of those you could sell in Amsterdam for 15,000 guilders.
translation.ja: アムステルダムなら １万5000ギルダーで売れる

translation.en: Lena says she doesn't care about money.
translation.ja: レーナはカネに興味がない

translation.en: Of course she does. She's young.
translation.ja: それはまだ　若いからだ

translation.en: And she's a little bit of a hippy.
translation.ja: 少しヒッピーだし

translation.en: But she doesn't face the same challenges you do.
translation.ja: 君と同じような苦労はしない

translation.en: I know what it's like, Wim, back in Europe.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパでは―

translation.en: When you're like us.
translation.ja: 僕も同じだ

translation.en: There's two men applying for the same position,
translation.ja: ２人が１つの職に申し込むと

translation.en: they take the whitest one.
translation.ja: 白い方が雇われる

translation.en: It happened to my father all the time.
translation.ja: 父がいつもそうだった

translation.en: I think every man must one day make a home.
translation.ja: 男ならいつか 家庭を持たないと

translation.en: And say to himself, This is my life,
translation.ja: 家庭こそが 自分の人生

translation.en: this is my love,
translation.ja: 自分の愛

translation.en: and this is who I am.
translation.ja: 自分自身だ

translation.en: But to get there, for men like you and me,
translation.ja: そのために 君とか僕は すべてのチャンスを

translation.en: we must take our opportunities when they come.
translation.ja: 生かさなきゃならない

translation.en: Are you sure we should do that?
translation.ja: 〈本当にするべきだと？〉

translation.en: Yeah, I...
translation.ja: 〈ああ 僕が…〉

translation.en: I know they want to help, but...
translation.ja: 〈親切で言ってくれてると 思うけど〉

translation.en: Are they still out there?
translation.ja: ２人はどこ？

translation.en: Down in the pool.
translation.ja: プールよ

translation.en: How much they got?
translation.ja: いくら持ってた？

translation.en: More than he told me they had.
translation.ja: 聞いてたより多かった

translation.en: Oh! Don't you just hate a lie?
translation.ja: ウソつきは嫌いだよね

translation.en: You know, we only want to help.
translation.ja: 助けになりたいの

translation.en: I know.
translation.ja: そうよね

translation.en: Alain thinks you don't understand.
translation.ja: アランが あなたは 分かってないって

translation.en: I do understand.
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: He wants us to buy the gems
translation.ja: あの石を買い

translation.en: and sell them for twice what we paid when we get home.
translation.ja: 倍の値段で売るってこと

translation.en: You don't think that's a good idea?
translation.ja: いい考えだと？

translation.en: The money will give you a good start, a nice life.
translation.ja: そのお金でいい生活が 始められるのよ

translation.en: - In any case, we really can't afford it. - I don't believe you.
translation.ja: 買うお金がないし あるんでしょ？

translation.en: Please, Lena...
translation.ja: お願い　レーナ

translation.en: just buy the gems.
translation.ja: 宝石を買って

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: ヴィム

translation.en: - Taxi for Knippenberg! - You took your bloody time.
translation.ja: ２ヵ月後 タクシーがつきました ずいぶん待った

translation.en: - - It's almost curfew.
translation.ja: 捕まるぞ

translation.en: Scheisse, Herman!
translation.ja: 〈ヘルマンのバカ！〉

translation.en: You know, anytime you want to learn to drive, I'll entirely support that decision.
translation.ja: 運転を学びたいなら サポートするけど

translation.en: You can call Yotin if you want someone to bark at.
translation.ja: 怒鳴りたいなら ヨーティンを

translation.en: I can't call Yotin.
translation.ja: 彼は呼べない

translation.en: No one at the Embassy can know what we're about to do.
translation.ja: 大使館員には 言えないことをする

translation.en: What if we're caught? If you're caught?
translation.ja: 捕まったらどうなるの？

translation.en: What? Stern rebuke?
translation.ja: 懲戒処分？

translation.en: Or the chop?
translation.ja: それともクビ？

translation.en: It's very cold in Holland right now, Herman.
translation.ja: 今 オランダは ものすごく寒い

translation.en: Have you thought about that?
translation.ja: それでもいいの？

translation.en: Yeah. Have you?
translation.ja: ああ 君は？

translation.en: Where to?
translation.ja: どこへ？

translation.en: The police station. Eastern Division.
translation.ja: 警察署に 東部地域課

translation.en: A monkey! Oh, my God.
translation.ja: サルよ　ウソでしょ

translation.en: Who is your guest, Ajay?
translation.ja: 彼女は？

translation.en: Hey, I'm Teresa.
translation.ja: 私 テレサ

translation.en: - Monique. It's her place. - Oh, um, you're the gem dealer.
translation.ja: モニクだ 宝石ディーラーね

translation.en: I am not. He is the gem dealer.
translation.ja: 私じゃない 彼が宝石ディーラー

translation.en: My husband Alain.
translation.ja: 私の夫　アランよ

translation.en: You live with these guys?
translation.ja: ここの住民？

translation.en: - Yeah, they are cool. - You want to dance?
translation.ja: そうだよ 踊らない？

translation.en: No, I don't dance.
translation.ja: 僕は踊れないんだ
朝７時

translation.en: Soon as it starts ringing, I've gotta go.
translation.ja: 目覚ましが鳴ったら 行くわ

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: That's okay.
translation.ja: いいんだ

translation.en: - How do I say I'm sorry in French? - Um...
translation.ja: フランス語でゴメンは？

translation.en: - Je suis désolée? Perfect? - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: 上手？

translation.en: You know, it's crazy but I've never slept with a Frenchman before.
translation.ja: 一度もフランス人と 寝たことないの

translation.en: Dominique?
translation.ja: 〈ドミニク〉

translation.en: Monique needs you to bring up more ice.
translation.ja: 〈モニカが 氷を持って来いと〉

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: 〈はい〉

translation.en: - So you are Teresa? - I am.
translation.ja: 君がテレサ？ ええ

translation.en: And you are American?
translation.ja: アメリカ人だね？

translation.en: Where are you heading?
translation.ja: これからどこに？

translation.en: Nepal, to a monastery.
translation.ja: ネパールの僧院に行くの

translation.en: If you're going to be a nun,
translation.ja: 尼さんになるのに―

translation.en: why do you have all these travelers' cheques?
translation.ja: そんなに トラベラーズチェックが？

translation.en: Well, they're not for me. They're for the monastery.
translation.ja: 僧院に渡すのよ

translation.en: The cost of pursuing Nirvana goes up and up.
translation.ja: 悟りを開くのにも 金がかかるのか

translation.en: So, you want to renounce the world entirely?
translation.ja: 完全な世捨て人になるの？

translation.en: No, I don't renounce the world.
translation.ja: いいえ 私が捨てたいのは

translation.en: Just the people who run it.
translation.ja: 世界を牛耳っている奴ら

translation.en: On my heart, you are too young to lock yourself away.
translation.ja: 自分を閉じ込めるには―

translation.en: Too young, too beautiful.
translation.ja: まだ若すぎる

translation.en: Your life too full of opportunity.
translation.ja: いろんなチャンスを ためすべきだ

translation.en: With you, you mean?
translation.ja: あなたと？

translation.en: Did Ajay tell you what I do?
translation.ja: アジェイから聞いた？

translation.en: Yes. It's gems, right?
translation.ja: 宝石ディーラーでしょ？

translation.en: I buy. I sell. And from time to time, others sell for me.
translation.ja: 人に売ってもらうことも あるんだ

translation.en: I am not going to smuggle gemstones for you.
translation.ja: 宝石を密輸するなんて ごめんよ

translation.en: - I'm taking vows. - And yet I find you here,
translation.ja: 私は尼になる そういう人が―

translation.en: openly offering yourself to my friend Dominique.
translation.ja: なぜドミニクに色目を？

translation.en: I'm not a nun yet.
translation.ja: まだ尼じゃない

translation.en: In which case, may I ask, have you been to...
translation.ja: それなら聞くけど タイのナイトクラブに 行ったことは？

translation.en: What shall we call them? Nightclubs here?
translation.ja: タイのナイトクラブに 行ったことは？

translation.en: Oh, you mean the sex shows?
translation.ja: セックスショーのこと？

translation.en: Well?
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: I have not.
translation.ja: まだない

translation.en: Then on this last night,
translation.ja: 尼さんになる前の―

translation.en: before you retreat from the world,
translation.ja: 最後の日となる今日

translation.en: perhaps you should.
translation.ja: 行くべきかも

translation.en: Je suis désolée.
translation.ja: 〈ごめんなさい〉

translation.en: Heartwarming.
translation.ja: 心がなごむ

translation.en: I'm gonna go.
translation.ja: もう行くわ

translation.en: Take it easy, Teresa.
translation.ja: しっかりしろ

translation.en: Fuck! Fucking idiot.
translation.ja: バカにしないで

translation.en: You think I don't know how a fucking downer comes on?
translation.ja: クスリ入れたんでしょ？

translation.en: - Don't touch me! Help! -
translation.ja: 離して　助けて

translation.en: He's Alain, he's Ajay! They fucking drugged me!
translation.ja: アランとアジェイが クスリを盛ったの

translation.en: Get her in the car.
translation.ja: 車を

translation.en: You draw attention to yourself, Teresa.
translation.ja: 大騒ぎするのは―

translation.en: It's not prudent.
translation.ja: 感心しないな

translation.en: Drank too much.
translation.ja: 飲み過ぎ

translation.en: Help.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: Please take it all. Please take it.
translation.ja: 全部持ってって 全部あげる

translation.en: - Won't the monastery miss it? -
translation.ja: 僧院は？

translation.en: You fucking asshole.
translation.ja: あんたたち 最低

translation.en: You're vulgar.
translation.ja: 君は低俗だ

translation.en: You throw yourself at men the way you throw yourself at religion.
translation.ja: 宗教に身を投じるように 男の中に身を投じた

translation.en: You cannot buy your way off the wheel, Teresa.
translation.ja: 金で解脱することは できない

translation.en: It is very American of you to think otherwise.
translation.ja: そう思うのが アメリカ人らしい

translation.en: And as you may know,
translation.ja: 知ってるだろ

translation.en: Americans do not prosper in this part of the world.
translation.ja: アメリカ人は そっちの世界では繁栄しない

translation.en: - Fuck you. - Hey, where are we going?
translation.ja: うるさい サンタクルーズ･ホテルで 降ろすんじゃ？

translation.en: Aren't we leaving her at the Santa Cruz?
translation.ja: サンタクルーズ･ホテルで 降ろすんじゃ？

translation.en: Where shall we leave her?
translation.ja: どこに降ろす？

translation.en: She's seen too much.
translation.ja: 全てを見られた

translation.en: And you saw, she's not afraid to complain.
translation.ja: 被害届も出しかねない

translation.en: She will only be another reckless Westerner who took drugs and went swimming.
translation.ja: クスリやって泳いだ 無謀な 白人として処理されるさ

translation.en: Once, I stole a taxi in Peshawar.
translation.ja: 前にペシャワールで タクシーを盗んだ

translation.en: I had to take it to Tehran, you see?
translation.ja: テヘランまで 行きたかったんだ

translation.en: The driver refused so I had to dose him.
translation.ja: でも運転手が拒んだから クスリを飲ませて

translation.en: I put him in the trunk...
translation.ja: トランクに入れた

translation.en: and after some time,
translation.ja: しばらくすると

translation.en: he awoke and began to moan and thump.
translation.ja: 彼は目覚めて うめき出したんだ

translation.en: It was upsetting the other passengers,
translation.ja: 別の乗客が怪しんだので

translation.en: so I stopped at a river to check on him.
translation.ja: 別の乗客が怪しんだので 川のそばでトランクを見たら

translation.en: But he had suffocated,
translation.ja: 彼は窒息してた

translation.en: so I took him out and helped him into the water.
translation.ja: だから僕は彼を 川に捨てたんだ

translation.en: I expected to feel great guilt,
translation.ja: 罪の意識を感じると思った

translation.en: but I did not,
translation.ja: でも 違った

translation.en: I felt free.
translation.ja: 自由を感じたんだ

translation.en: Free from judgment.
translation.ja: 裁く者はなかった

translation.en: Mine.
translation.ja: 自分も

translation.en: God's.
translation.ja: 神も

translation.en: It was all entirely...
translation.ja: 悲劇など―

translation.en: without tragedy.
translation.ja: 起きなかった

translation.en: Did they come looking for you? Did they catch you?
translation.ja: 警察に追われた？ 捕まった？

translation.en: Nobody has ever caught me, Ajay. No one.
translation.ja: 僕を捕まえた者は誰もいない １人も

translation.en: We can do it together.
translation.ja: 一緒にやろう

translation.en: Are you gonna hurt me?
translation.ja: 乱暴するの？

translation.en: No. Better than that.
translation.ja: いや　もっといいことを

translation.en: Oh, compassionate ones.
translation.ja: 慈悲深い者たちよ

translation.en: This person is going from this world
translation.ja: この者はこちらの世界から

translation.en: to the other shore.
translation.ja: 向こう岸に向かう

translation.en: She is leaving this world.
translation.ja: この世を去るのだ

translation.en: She is dying without choice.
translation.ja: この世を去るのだ

translation.en: She has no friends.
translation.ja: 彼女には友がいない

translation.en: She is suffering greatly.
translation.ja: 悶(もだ)え苦しんでいるのに

translation.en: She has no refuge. She has no protector.
translation.ja: 逃げる場所も 守ってくれる者もいない

translation.en: She has no allies.
translation.ja: 味方は誰もいない

translation.en: The light of this life has set.
translation.ja: 命の光が消えて

translation.en: She is embarking on a great battle.
translation.ja: 大いなる戦いに挑んでいく

translation.en: She is seized by the great evil spirit.
translation.ja: しかし邪悪な霊によって 阻まれる

translation.en: She is terrified by the messengers
translation.ja: そして彼女は死神からの―

translation.en: of the Lord of Death.
translation.ja: メッセージにおびえる

translation.en: She is entering existence after existence.
translation.ja: 彼女は次々に命を渡り歩く

translation.en: Because of her karma, she is helpless.
translation.ja: カルマの前には なすすべがない

translation.en: The time has come when she must go alone
translation.ja: その時が来たら １人でいかねばならない

translation.en: without a friend.
translation.ja: 友もつれず

translation.en: - - Lena. Shh.
translation.ja: レーナ

translation.en: Are those dead bodies?
translation.ja: それが遺体なの？

translation.en: Yes. Burned, I think.
translation.ja: ああ 焼かれたみたいだ

translation.en: What's wrong with us?
translation.ja: なんなの？

translation.en: Monique? Please.
translation.ja: モニク 助けて

translation.en: And the remains of their clothing.
translation.ja: 服の一部が残ってる

translation.en: Look!
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: My God.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: It's them.
translation.ja: 彼らだ

translation.en: - Alain, please help us. - Shh.
translation.ja: アラン　お願い助けて

translation.en: Why has no one done anything?
translation.ja: なんで ほっとかれてたんだ
